abstract: A judge ordered the Internet-based telephone service to stop using technologies patented by Verizon Communications.
snippet: A judge ordered the Internet-based telephone service to stop using technologies patented by Verizon Communications.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge said yesterday that he would order Vonage Holdings, the Internet-based telephone service, to stop using technologies patented by Verizon Communications.

headline.main: Vonage Told to Stop Using Verizon Technology
headline.print_headline: Vonage Told to Stop Using Verizon Technology
